protocol.name: P-GSE30713-10
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-11
protocol.text: Raw microarray data were normalized using the robust multiarray analysis (RMA) algorithm in the BIOCONDUCTOR affy package. Then the microarray data were analyzed using Significance Analysis of Microarrays (SAM) method with default parameters as well as a manual setting of false discovery threshold (FDR) < 0.027 in D and <0.022 in FR.

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-2
protocol.text: The homozygous 35S:3FLAG-FHY3-3HA fhy3-4 seedlings grown in D or continuous FR light for 4 d were used for ChIP assays following the procedure described previously

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-3
protocol.text: 5 g of seedlings were first cross-linked with 1% formaldehyde under vacuum, and then the samples were ground to powder in liquid nitrogen. The chromatin complexes were isolated and sonicated and then incubated with monoclonal FLAG antibodies (Sigma-Aldrich). The precipitated DNA was recovered and used to generate Illumina sequencing libraries according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-4
protocol.text: Sequencing reads from D and FR libraries were mapped to TAIR9 genome release of Arabidopsis thaliana using the MAQ software, allowing for up to two mismatching nucleotides and no gaps. Only uniquely mapped reads were retained for further analyses. The output of the analysis pipeline was converted to browser extensible data (BED) files for viewing the data in the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) genome browser. Numerous peak detection algorithms have been proposed recently for analyzing the ChIP-seq datasets, and they provide more or less similar results. In this study, MACS software with default parameters (bandwidth, 300 bp; mfold, 32; p-value of 1.00e-05) was used to call peaks representing enriched binding sites.

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-5
protocol.text: treated with 10 μM dexamethasone (DEX) or MOCK (equal volume of ethanol) for 2 h

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-6
protocol.text: FHY3p:FHY3-GR fhy3-4 transgenic seedlings grown in D or continuous FR light for 4 d

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-7
protocol.text: total RNA was isolated using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-8
protocol.text: RNA quality was assessed with an Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer, and hybridization to the Affymetrix GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Arrays was performed according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE30713-9
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Drosophila Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
